name: Soul Legends
description:
Soul Legends

Search around the forgotten woods , triying to help the old tortured legends , can you help them all?

Try changing your perspective to see the objets diferent like they seem and try to collect all the secret items without getting killed by the souls in pain always following you , can you accept the challenge?

Game developed for Game Jam Tec 2021 in 24 hours

Still in development

CONTROLS:
